title: Rx Magic Hands
description: An alternate cover for this ASIN can be found here and here.Dive into an Eye-rolling experience!Is This Heaven Or Hell?Jim is just an ordinary guy working for an ordinary company. But his female co-workers are not ordinary. They are extremely attractive and Jim has to constantly struggle to hide his untamable erotic obsession. Sometimes it’s incredibly difficult. They look like fashion models. Especially Cherry – what a name – who sits in the cubicle right in front of him. She is the protagonist in his wildest and wettest fantasies. Jim would sacrifice everything to get a taste of Cherry. A Genius Plan!Jim has to do something. This cannot go any longer. So he comes up with an ingenious plan. He sets up a massage parlor so he can get his hands on those tantalizing beauties. And it works. His first “client” is Sheila, one of Cherry’s closest friends, and he offers her a heated massage that ends up in steamy, spine-tingling sex. Jim’s plan works after all! His next adventure offers him an even more thrilling experience with his neighbor, who is ready to pleasure him in mind-blowing ways. And when Jim is selected for a business trip with his sexy boss, Kayla, things seem to get out of hand. Will Jim manage to seduce Kayla or is she determined to discover his massaging skills? Find out for yourself in this spine-tingling romantic novel by Shiba Anie!
author: Shiba Anie
